text: The Cypriot pound, also known as the Cypriot lira (, plural , and , , from the Latin through the Italian ), was the national currency used in Cyprus until December 31, 2007. It was replaced by the euro in Cyprus and Malta on January 1, 2008 at a fixed exchange rate of 0.585274 pound per euro. In the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus, which is only recognized by Turkey, the Turkish lira is used as the currency since 1974. == Related pages == * Cypriot euro coins * Economy of Cyprus == Other websites == * * Category:Economy of Cyprus
title: Cypriot pound
